meanings.sent1: The cheesemaker used the curdiest milk to make the cheese.
meanings.sent2: The curdiest cheese in the shop was a hit with customers.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the curdiest cheese was a mouse in disguise!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as curdiest as the moon on a clear night.
meanings.sent5: The curdiest clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.

meanings.sent1: The curdiest yogurt was a favorite breakfast choice.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the curdiest cottage cheese with her salad.
meanings.sent3: The curdiest milkshake was so thick, it could stand on its own!
meanings.sent4: The curdiest river flowed with creamy white waves.
meanings.sent5: The curdiest blanket wrapped around her like a warm hug.
